mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chats (sender_code, receiver_code, message, timestamp) VALUES (#{senderCode}, #{receiverCode}, #{message}, #{timestamp})
mapper.select: SELECT id, sender_code AS senderCode, receiver_code AS receiverCode, message, timestamp FROM chats WHERE (sender_code = #{senderCode} AND receiver_code = #{receiverCode}) OR (sender_code = #{receiverCode} AND receiver_code = #{senderCode}) ORDER BY timestamp ASC
